      int[] encode(Connections c, double inputData)
      Convenience wrapper for encodeIntoArray(Connections, double, int[])
      protected abstract int[] encodeIntoArray(Connections c, double inputData, int[] output)
      Encodes inputData and puts the encoded value into the numpy output array, which is a 1-D array of length returned by Connections.getW().

    • Method Detail

      • encodeIntoArray

        protected abstract int[] encodeIntoArray(Connections c,
                    double inputData,
                    int[] output)
        Encodes inputData and puts the encoded value into the numpy output array, which is a 1-D array of length returned by Connections.getW(). Note: The numpy output array is reused, so clear it before updating it.
        Parameters:
        c -
        inputData - Data to encode. This should be validated by the encoder.
        output - 1-D array of same length returned by Connections.getW()
        Returns:

      • encode

        public int[] encode(Connections c,
           double inputData)
        Convenience wrapper for encodeIntoArray(Connections, double, int[])
        Parameters:
        c - the memory
        inputData - the input scalar
        Returns:
        an array with the encoded representation of inputData

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription(Connections c)
        Returns this ScalarEncoder's description.
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:
